title: OBAMA / What type?
content:
Hi guys,

what type is used here:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706084958im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/screen-capture_4141.jpg)

Awesome website by the way: [http://www.barackobama.com/index.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706084958/http:/www.barackobama.com/index.php "http://www.barackobama.com/index.php")

 [‹ Beverly Hills sans-serif (apologies for crappy quality)](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706084958/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43983 "Go to previous forum topic") [Can anyone identify this font? Thanks! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706084958/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43950 "Go to next forum topic")
author: flabrea

comments.content: I believe this is Eric Gill’s Joanna, with liberal tracking applied. No pun intended.
I remember having read somewhere that Obama uses Joanna for something, but this certainly isn’t Joanna.
Yeah, on a closer look, I see what you mean. That lowercase “a” is a dead giveaway for Joanna, but the rest doesn’t quite sync up. Sorry to jump to conclusions...
